company_commercial_names: easylearn languages | easylearn languages | where learning a second language is fun
short_description: easylearn languages is a language & speaking school based in new jersey, united states.
long_description: our program is the result of intense research, classroom experience and many years of my journey to raise a bilingual child. teach a foreign language as a fun, educational and interactive process. beyond the flashcards and robotic practices found in online programs currently available. we offer foreign language classes online for adults and children in an individual setting or in a small group environment. individual classes are cutomized to fully meet the student's level and needs. learning is not the product of teaching. learn from the comfort of home. we will be sharing resources, songs and videos to help your learning process be more fun. let's learn together. eas y learn programs are designed to be fun and educational. we use a combination of the best educator/classroom tested products, which offer the best skills in each respective area. visual techniques for infants, activity books (ages 2 and up), picture cards, objects, puppets and much more offer diversity which will capture the child's short attention span.

generated_description: easy learn languages is a company based in wenonah, new jersey, specializing in foreign language instruction for both adults and children. the company offers individual and small group classes in various languages, including spanish, portuguese, and other languages for travel and business. their programs are designed to be fun and educational, utilizing methods such as music, movement, reading, and creativity. easy learn languages emphasizes bilingual instruction, aiming to provide a comprehensive learning experience that includes vocabulary, repetition, and interactive activities. the company is a member of several professional organizations, including the american council of teachers of foreign languages (actfl) and the foreign language educators of new jersey (flenj).
